forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with a steady, soaking rain during the afternoon hours. Increasing winds. High 17C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady rain for the afternoon. High 64F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with rain this evening...then scattered thunderstorms overnight. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain...scattered thunderstorms overnight. Low 53F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the evening...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the evening, then cloudy with rain likely later at night. Low 51F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early with mainly sunny skies later in the day as drier air moves in on gusty breezes. High 14C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with mainly sunny skies later in the day as drier air moves in on gusty breezes. High 59F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 8C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 48F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High around 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 16C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 62F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 11C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 59F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
